verses.verse: And Hiram<WH2438> king<WH4428> of Tyre<WH6865> sent<WH7971> his servants<WH5650> unto Solomon<WH8010>; for he had heard<WH8085> that they had anointed<WH4886> him king<WH4428> in the room of his father<WH1>: for Hiram<WH2438> was ever<WH3117> a lover<WH157> of David<WH1732>.
And Solomon<WH8010> sent<WH7971> to Hiram<WH2438>, saying<WH559>,

Thou knowest<WH3045> how that David<WH1732> my father<WH1> could<WH3201> not build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> unto the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> his God<WH430> for<WH6440> the wars<WH4421> which were about him on every side<WH5437>, until the LORD<WH3068> put<WH5414> them under the soles<WH3709> of his feet<WH7272>.
But now the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430> hath given me rest<WH5117> on every side<WH5439>, so that there is neither adversary<WH7854> nor evil<WH7451> occurrent<WH6294>.

And, behold, I purpose<WH559> to build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> unto the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430>, as the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto David<WH1732> my father<WH1>, saying<WH559>, Thy son<WH1121>, whom I will set<WH5414> upon thy throne<WH3678> in thy room, he shall build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> unto my name<WH8034>. purpose: Heb. say

Now therefore command<WH6680> thou that they hew<WH3772> me cedar trees<WH730> out of Lebanon<WH3844>; and my servants<WH5650> shall be with thy servants<WH5650>: and unto thee will I give<WH5414> hire<WH7939> for thy servants<WH5650> according to all that thou shalt appoint<WH559>: for thou knowest<WH3045> that there is not among us any<WH376> that can skill<WH3045> to hew<WH3772> timber<WH6086> like unto the Sidonians<WH6722>. appoint: Heb. say

And it came to pass, when Hiram<WH2438> heard<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of Solomon<WH8010>, that he rejoiced<WH8055> greatly<WH3966>, and said<WH559>, Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> this day<WH3117>, which hath given<WH5414> unto David<WH1732> a wise<WH2450> son<WH1121> over this great<WH7227> people<WH5971>.

And Hiram<WH2438> sent<WH7971> to Solomon<WH8010>, saying<WH559>, I have considered<WH8085> the things which thou sentest<WH7971> to me for: and I will do<WH6213> all thy desire<WH2656> concerning timber<WH6086> of cedar<WH730>, and concerning timber<WH6086> of fir<WH1265>. considered: Heb. heard

My servants<WH5650> shall bring them down<WH3381> from Lebanon<WH3844> unto the sea<WH3220>: and I will convey<WH7760> them by sea<WH3220> in floats<WH1702> unto the place<WH4725> that thou shalt appoint<WH7971> me, and will cause them to be discharged<WH5310> there, and thou shalt receive<WH5375> them: and thou shalt accomplish<WH6213> my desire<WH2656>, in giving<WH5414> food<WH3899> for my household<WH1004>. appoint: Heb. send
So Hiram<WH2438> gave<WH5414> Solomon<WH8010> cedar<WH730> trees<WH6086> and fir<WH1265> trees<WH6086> according to all his desire<WH2656>.

And Solomon<WH8010> gave<WH5414> Hiram<WH2438> twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> measures<WH3734> of wheat<WH2406> for food<WH4361> to his household<WH1004>, and twenty<WH6242> measures<WH3734> of pure<WH3795> oil<WH8081>: thus gave<WH5414> Solomon<WH8010> to Hiram<WH2438> year<WH8141> by year<WH8141>. measures: Heb. cors

And the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> Solomon<WH8010> wisdom<WH2451>, as he promised<WH1696> him: and there was peace<WH7965> between Hiram<WH2438> and Solomon<WH8010>; and they two<WH8147> made<WH3772> a league<WH1285> together<WH8147>.
And king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> raised<WH5927> a levy<WH4522> out of all Israel<WH3478>; and the levy<WH4522> was thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> men<WH376>. levy: Heb. tribute of men

And he sent<WH7971> them to Lebanon<WH3844>, ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> a month<WH2320> by courses<WH2487>: a month<WH2320> they were in Lebanon<WH3844>, and two<WH8147> months<WH2320> at home<WH1004>: and Adoniram<WH141> was over the levy<WH4522>.
And Solomon<WH8010> had threescore and ten<WH7657> thousand<WH505> that bare<WH5375> burdens<WH5449>, and fourscore<WH8084> thousand<WH505> hewers<WH2672> in the mountains<WH2022>;

Beside the chief<WH8269> of Solomon's<WH8010> officers<WH5324> which were over the work<WH4399>, three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967>, which ruled<WH7287> over the people<WH5971> that wrought<WH6213> in the work<WH4399>.

And the king<WH4428> commanded<WH6680>, and they brought<WH5265> great<WH1419> stones<WH68>, costly<WH3368> stones<WH68>, and hewed<WH1496> stones<WH68>, to lay the foundation<WH3245> of the house<WH1004>.

And Solomon's<WH8010> builders<WH1129> and Hiram's<WH2438> builders<WH1129> did hew<WH6458> them, and the stonesquarers<WH1382>: so they prepared<WH3559> timber<WH6086> and stones<WH68> to build<WH1129> the house<WH1004>. stonesquares: or, Giblites
